episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on October 10, 2024, with Justin regarding motor vehicle accident case Malcom-Glass-Jones-MVA-10-2-2024 involving Malcom Glass Jones. The client, Malcom Glass Jones, DOB 3/14/2006 and SSN 303-31-4191, was a passenger in a 2006 Chrysley Sebring driven by his wife, Gasia Huffman. The incident occurred in Shelbyville, Kentucky, by Walmart on October 2, and the County Sheriff responded to the scene. They were following a vehicle when another vehicle merged into their lane and slammed on the brakes, causing the client’s vehicle to rear-end the other vehicle.

Gasia Huffman, the driver and Malcom’s wife, sustained a broken ankle. Injuries reported include Malcom’s lower back pain and left knee pain. Starlite. Personal Injury Protection (PIP) is through Shelter Insurance, with Bodily Injury (BI) coverage listed as through the Commonwealth of Kentucky. Correspondence can be directed to 1442 Altawood Drive, Clarksville, IN 47129. The client has health insurance and will text a copy of the card.

The person making contact was Justin, and the contact date/time was October 10, 2024.

episodes.natural_language:
Case: Malcom-Glass-Jones-MVA-10-2-2024

Initial client contact on October 2, 2024 regarding a motor vehicle accident involving Malcom Glass Jones. The client, Malcom Glass Jones, born March 14, 2006 (SSN 303-31-4191), was a passenger in a 2006 Chrysley Sebring. The incident occurred in Shelbyville, Kentucky, near a Walmart. The driver was Gasia Huffman, the client’s wife, and the County Sheriff responded to the scene.

According to the report, the client was following another vehicle when a separate vehicle merged into their lane and slammed on the brakes, causing the client’s vehicle to rear-end the vehicle that merged.

The driver, Gasia Huffman (the client’s wife), sustained a broken ankle. Injuries reported for the client include lower back pain and left knee pain.

PIP coverage is with Shelter Insurance, and the bodily injury (BI) coverage is listed as the Commonwealth of Kentucky. The corresponding address is 1442 Altawood Drive, Clarksville, IN 47129. The client has health insurance and will text a copy of the card.

Starlite.
